attributes.action: Abolish unfair mobile phone network charges!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition seeks to protest against giant mobile phone companies who unjustly charge customers for aspects which should be inclusive of the services the customers already pay for.
We propose:

The abolishment of roaming charges and costly international usage.

A severe reduction in costly Wap and mobile internet charges.

No additional fee for paying a bill by any method exclusive of direct debit.

The regulation of contract prices so that they are not dependent on the duration of the contract ( for example no charging certain customers more because they choose a sorter, 18 month over a 2 year contract).

If anybody reading this petition feels there are more issues to add to the above list please mention so!
